Package com.example.myinventoryapp

package com.example.myinventoryapp
  • Class
    Description
    AddActivity
    This activity handles the creation of items and their upload to firebase
    CapturePopUp
    This is a DialogFragment that shows an alert dialog with having the options of capturing an image, selecting from the gallery, or deleting an existing image.
    CapturePopUp.OnFragmentInteractionListener
     
    DeleteActivity
    Activity displays a checked list of items and provides options to user including select and unselect all, and delete selected items.
    DeletePopUp
    This is a DialogFragment that shows an alert dialog popup asking the user to confirm or cancel when attempting to delete item(s) by clicking the yes or no button respectively.
    DeletePopUp.OnFragmentInteractionListener
    Interface DeletePopUp dialog fragment for the method to be implemented in DeleteActivity class.
    EditActivity
    Activity allows the user to edit the selected item contents as it updates in the firestore database.
    ExampleInstrumentedTest
    Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
    ExampleUnitTest
    Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
    FieldValidator
    Class for checking fields of input data.
    GalleryActivity
    This activity handles using the camera and the phone's photo gallery, additionally it also handles permissions for the above.
    Global
    Class for managing connections to firebase
    Item
    Item is the object content item that implements parcelable interface whose instances can be written to and restored from a Parcel - container for a message (data and object references).
    ItemList
    ItemList is a custom ArrayAdapter used for displaying a list of items in the UI.
    ListActivity
    This is a class that represents an activity that displays the list of items.
    ListActivityTest
     
    LoginActivity
    LoginActivity class is responsible for handling user login functionality.This activity provides UI components for the user to enter their username and password, as well as a login method utilizing Firebase Authentication.
    SelectListAdaptor
    SelectListAdaptor is a custom ArrayAdapter used for displaying a list of items in the UI.
    SelectTagItemsActivity
    Activity displays a checked list of items and provides options to user including select and unselect all, for choosing items they want to add tags to.
    SignUpActivity
    Class for handling Sign Up
    StartUpActivity
    Class for handling Starting Activity
    TagsActivity
    Activity displays the current list of saved tags in firebase, allows user to create new tags and set tags to selected items passed from another activity.
    ViewItemActivity
    This is a class that allows you to view an item when the item is clicked from the list
